It is like a streaming service where you share the experience of various award-winning TV programmes, films, anime, documentaries and more via sharing your screen or on a room.

Watch anywhere, anytime. Sign in with your Watchdawgs account to watch instantly on the web at watchdawgs.com from your personal computer or on any internet-connected device  including smart TVs, smartphones, tablets, streaming media players and game consoles.

 Take watchdawgs with you anywhere.
To play games with your friends you have to download SNES roms on your device and invite friends to the room you have created and load the rom
You can watch whatever you want including youtube video links as well as local videos or via sharing the screen. Watch as much as you want, any time you want.
